mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT o.order_id, p.pd_name, o.order_state, o.payDate FROM shop.order AS o JOIN shop.order_detail AS od ON o.order_id=od.order_id JOIN shop.products AS p ON p.pd_id=od.pd_id WHERE o.user_email=#{user_email} ORDER BY o.payDate DESC;
select order_id, user_email, total_price, order_state, payDate from shop.order order by payDate DESC
mapper.insert: insert into `order` (order_id, user_email, dv_name, dv_address1, dv_address2, dv_address3, dv_address4, dv_phone, dv_option, dv_message, total_price, payment_method) values (#{order_id}, #{user_email}, #{dv_name}, #{dv_address1}, #{dv_address2}, #{dv_address3}, #{dv_address4}, #{dv_phone}, #{dv_option}, #{dv_message}, #{total_price}, #{payment_method});
insert into order_detail (order_id, pd_id, pd_size, pd_quantity, price_sum) select #{order_id}, pd_id, pd_size, pd_quantity, #{price_sum} from cart where user_email=#{user_email};
